entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain mixed with snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain mixed with snow beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
